description.p: The psicrystal blends its color with its surroundings, becoming invisible until it takes any action.

description.p: When the psicrystal is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead take no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

description.p: When its creator invokes a manifestation, the psicrystal can deliver the manifestation as if it had invoked the manifestation. The psicrystal must be within 100 feet of its creator, and it must use its reaction to deliver the manifestation when its creator invokes it. If the manifestation requires an attack roll or save DC, use its creator’s attack modifier or save DC where necessary.
